js_texts: Searching for storage rooms. Please wait...
- The selected warehouse has a storage room available on $1
The storage room will be at your disposal from $1 onwards.
The price per month is NOK $1 for the storage room, and NOK $2 for the insurance. NOK $3 in total.
Starting in $1, NOK $2 will be automatically deducted from your account on the first of each month, until you cancel the subscription.
You can cancel the subscription at any time from your dashboard.
- If you cancel before or on the 15th of the month, you will keep the storage room until the end of the month.
- If you cancel after the 15th, you will pay for the next month and keep the storage room until the end of the next month.
- $1 other warehouses have available storage rooms of this type.
An error occurred. Please contact customer service. Error code: $1.
- No other warehouses have available storage rooms of this type.
- One other warehouse has available storage rooms of this type.

php_texts: The subscription continues until you cancel it, which you can do at any time from your dashboard.
